svg.text: McCzarny recently focused on his black-fat-cat,
black-fat-cat, he is building a system to
detect and deter a stray cat using hardware and
computer vision. He set up equipment and worked
on cat detection, debugging complex library
issues on older hardware, even contributing to
OpenBLAS. He also added a time-based rule for
detection accuracy. For his ghsummary tool, he
developed a new "strict" mode for detailed
LLM-based activity analysis. He improved its
documentation and used it to generate his own
profile summary. His upload-image GitHub action
was updated with Cloudinary support and an
image deletion feature. He also refined its
inputs and tests, seeking community input for
